title: Reliance AGM 2025: Ambanis announce AI-powered Riya, electronics, and devices - details here
description: Reliance Industries is aggressively integrating artificial intelligence across its diverse business sectors, positioning itself as a leader in India's AI revolution. Key initiatives include Riya, an AI voice assistant for JioHotstar, and JioPC, transforming screens into cloud computers. The company is also developing AI-native infrastructure and services, aiming to make India the world's first AI-native digital economy.

title: What is Japan hoping to achieve by boosting its partnership with India?
description: The partnership, crucial amidst China's growing assertiveness in the Indo-Pacific, will focus on key areas such as semiconductors, critical minerals, artificial intelligence, and pharmaceuticals
content:

title: China to have 300,000 driverless taxis
description: SHANGHAI — China is likely to see 300,000 driverless cabs operate in its four top-tier cities as early as 2030, buoyed by advancements in artificial intelligence (AI) and its highly competitive electric vehicle (EV) sector, UBS said on Thursday.

title: 'Japan's tech, India's talent led to expansion of economic ties,' says Japan's PM Shigeru Ishiba During PM Modi's Visit
description: Ishiba said that cooperation is also underway between both countries in the Artificial Intelligence, space and clean energy sectors.
content: Japan's Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba, on Friday, noted that Japan's technology and India's raw talent can make an outstanding blend of economic cooperation. Ishiba, while addressing the 15th India-Japan Annual Summit along with Prime Minister Narend... [1960 chars]

title: China Warns Against ‘Disorderly Competition’ in Booming AI Race
description: China said it will prevent excess competition in the red-hot artificial intelligence sector, a signal that Beijing wants to avoid wasteful investment even as it seeks to turn the technology into a key pillar of the economy.

title: Dell lifts annual forecasts on AI server sales boom
description: Dell raised its annual revenue and profit forecasts today, buoyed by demand for its artificial intelligence-optimised servers that are powered by Nvidia's advanced chips.
